commits.message: [pallet-revive] fix subxt submit & add debug statments (#10016)
[revive] move existing files to prepare evm backend introduction (#9501)
[pallet-revive] Make Runtime call dispatchable as eth transaction (#8883)
[pallet-revive-rpc] fix sqlite in-memory connection pool issue (#8897)
[pallet-revive] only record diff if value changed (#8881)
Eth transaction do not double bump the nonce (#8829)
[pallet-revive] make subscription task panic on error (#8587)
[pallet-revive] tracing prepare support for future tracing APIS (#8495)
[pallet-revive] Add support for eip1898 block notation (#7848)
[pallet-revive] tracing should wrap around call stack execution (#7676)
[eth-indexer] subscribe to finalize blocks instead of best blocks (#7260)
[pallet-revive] use evm decimals in call host fn (#6466)
[pallet-revive] move event topics in event's body (#5640)
Use umbrella crate for minimal template (#5155)
Contracts: Remove topics for internal events (#4510)
Contracts: Remove ED from base deposit (#3536)
Contracts: Only exec parsed code in benchmarks (#3915)
Contracts: Refactor API to use WeightMeter (#2943)
XCM remove extra QueryId types from traits (#3763)
benchmark: allow range trailing comma in RangeArgs (#3598)
Contracts Bump ApiVersion and add test (#3619)
Contracts: Remove unstable on lock/unlock_delegate_dependency host fns (#3606)
Contracts upload with Determinism::Enforced when possible (#3540)
Contracts: Charge min amount when processing deletion queue (#2934)
Contracts Add new version for marking new stable API (#3415)
better debugging for accountid32 in debug build (#2990)
Contracts rename riscv-experimental and enable ci tests (#2879)
Contracts: Add XCM traits to interface with contracts (#2086)
Contracts move fixtures to new crate (#2246)
Contracts: Add benchmarks to include files (#2022)
Contracts: Ensure latest migration match pallet_version (#14676)
Companion PR for contracts delegate deposit PR (#2913)
Contracts: Use RuntimeUpgrade hooks instead of Hooks::on_runtime_upgrade (#2570)
Update macro use and optimize storage collection (#13970)
contracts: make test work with debugger (#13776)
Companion PR for contract deletion updates (#2409)
[Contracts] Overflowing bounded `DeletionQueue` allows DoS against contract termination (#13702)
